comments.en:
This is one of the so-called GDI- or winprinters, a printer with a proprietary data protocol, which is not publicly documented by the manufacturer.
Fortunately, Nicolas Boichat has reverse-engineered the protocol using the techniques described by Rildo Pragana, which lead to this driver.
Old comments:
Offers PCL emulation, but this appears to be in software.
Even if PCL is in firmware, it is limited to 300dpi.

Consumables/Refills: Toner Cartridge
